meanings.definition: The state of being dazzled or amazed.
meanings.sent1: The bedazzlement in her eyes showed how impressed she was.
meanings.sent2: The magician's tricks caused a lot of bedazzlement in the audience.
meanings.sent3: The bedazzlement on his face was priceless when he saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent4: The bedazzlement of the city lights at night was truly breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The bedazzlement of the fireworks display left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: The act of dazzling or impressing someone greatly.
meanings.sent1: The bedazzlement of her performance was evident in the standing ovation.
meanings.sent2: The bedazzlement of the jewelry display caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The bedazzlement on his face when he saw the new car was priceless.
meanings.sent4: The bedazzlement of the grand fireworks show was unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The bedazzlement of the elaborate decorations left guests speechless.
